name: Extended Car Warranty: The Game
description:
Extended Car Warranty: The Game

This is a short visual novel about you going to a car dealership to buy yourself a sweet new ride, when you run into the owner of the car dealership, well, let's just say some lovey dovey stuff happens! In this world of extended car warranties and love, what choice will you make?

Made by BunnyHop for DG game jam
